description: This app has gotten much better! I have no issues updating my Pinetime, the connection to the watch is much quicker and more reliable now too. great work!
one of the best companion app for the pinetime

I wasn't able to get Siglo working easily, and was happy with the performance of Watchmate.
I would only suggest improving reliability reconnecting, background run permission in Flatseal to work, and maybe integration with Gnome Health for steps
summary: Issues reconnecting, but works well once connected

description: Exactly what I was looking for; a one-click install application that can update my ressources. This app works without any issue
This companion app works great with my phone running PostmarketOS and the features listed all work for me as intended.
